SELECT aa.click_date, IFNULL(bb.amount,0) AS count FROM ( SELECT CURDATE() AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 4 DAY) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 5 DAY) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY) AS click_date ) AS aa LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(id) AS amount, any_value(DATE_FORMAT(invoke_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) AS click_date FROM api_open_count WHERE invoke_time>=DATE(NOW())-INTERVAL 6 DAY GROUP BY TO_DAYS(invoke_time) ) AS bb ON aa.click_date=bb.click_date order by aa.click_date asc
